name: JSON Key match
description: Matches JSON keys while allowing string values with : character.
content: {      identifier: "module_specs",   device_name: "Sageon",   device_type: "Sageon",   bluePrint: {      specs: {         SNMP: 1      },            display_mapping: {          discrete_alarms: {            display: 1,            point_low: 1,            point_high: 12,         },      },      default_points: [                  { disp: 1, pnt: 12, name: "SMR Urgent", name2: "", pvEventID: "gen:CDTech-Sageon:SMRUrgent" }      ],   }}
author: Richard Howell
